name: @accu.finance/protocol-v1
description: Accu Protocol V1 smart contracts - A fork of Aave Protocol V2

scripts.localhost:deploy:bsc-main: cross-env ADDRESS_PROVIDER_ID=2 npx hardhat deploy --network localhost --tags testEnv
scripts.localhost:deploy:ethereum-main: cross-env ADDRESS_PROVIDER_ID=1 npx hardhat deploy --network localhost --tags testEnv
scripts.localhost:node:test-env:bsc-main: cross-env ADDRESS_PROVIDER_ID=2 npx hardhat node --tags testEnv --hostname 0.0.0.0
scripts.bsctestnet:deploy:bsc-main: cross-env ADDRESS_PROVIDER_ID=2 npx hardhat deploy --network bsctestnet --tags testnetBscmain
scripts.test-amm: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-amm/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-amm-scenarios: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-amm/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-amm/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && npx hardhat test test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-subgraph:scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat --network hardhatevm_docker test test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/subgraph-scenarios.spec.ts
scripts.test:main:check-list: npm run compile && FORK=main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test  test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/mainnet/check-list.spec.ts
scripts.aave:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- aave:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.aave:kovan:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- aave:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.matic:mumbai:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic --skip-registry
scripts.matic:matic:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic --skip-registry
scripts.amm:kovan:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- amm:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.aave:docker:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- aave:mainnet
scripts.aave:kovan:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- aave:mainnet
scripts.matic:mumbai:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic
scripts.matic:matic:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic
scripts.amm:kovan:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- amm:mainnet
scripts.aave:docker:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave
scripts.aave:kovan:add-market-to-registry-from-c: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave
scripts.matic:mumbai:add-market-to-registry-from: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai add-market-to-registry --pool Matic
scripts.amm:kovan:add-market-to-registry-from-co: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Amm
scripts.matic:matic:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic add-market-to-registry --pool Matic
scripts.aave:main:add-market-to-registry-from-co: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave
scripts.aave:docker:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave --deploy-registry
scripts.aave:kovan:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.matic:mumbai:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.amm:kovan:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Amm --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.matic:matic:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic -- add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.aave:main:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic -- add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.aave:ropsten:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:ropsten -- aave:mainnet --verify
scripts.aave:fork:main:tenderly: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:tenderly-main -- aave:mainnet
scripts.aave:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat aave:mainnet
scripts.aave:fork:kovan: npm run compile && FORK=kovan hardhat aave:mainnet
scripts.amm:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat amm:mainnet
scripts.amm:fork:kovan: npm run compile && FORK=kovan hardhat amm:mainnet
scripts.amm:fork:main:tenderly: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:tenderly-main -- amm:mainnet
scripts.aave:main:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- aave:mainnet --verify
scripts.aave:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Aave
scripts.amm:main:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- amm:mainnet --verify
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-kovan: npm run compile && hardhat --network kovan external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-main: npm run compile && hardhat --network main external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify

author: Aave
